General.Name: Exploitasi Energi Indonesia
General.Description: PT Exploitasi Energi Indonesia Tbk operates as an integrated coal-based energy company in Indonesia. It operates through Coal Trading, Vessel Lease Services, Steam Power Plant, Other segments. The company engages in mining and trading of coal; and operates coal fired and steam power plants. It also provides vessel leasing and shipping services. The company was formerly known as PT Central Korporindo International and changed its name to PT Exploitasi Energi Indonesia Tbk in 2010. PT Exploitasi Energi Indonesia Tbk was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Exploitasi Energi Indonesia Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Saibatama Internasional Mandiri

1.Name: Mr. Wim  Andrian
1.Title: Head of Investor Relations & Corp. Sec.
